item.title: (BETA) How to build a website with Hugo
item.description: !!! UNDER CONSTRUCTION !!! Link to heading This is a concise, step-by-step guide on how to build a website with Hugo, and deploy/host it on Github Pages. Just like this one. Prerequisites/installations Link to heading Have Hugo extended version on your computer (https://gohugo.io/installation/) Hugo is a website generator/building framework written in Go Have git on your computer (https://git-scm.com/) Git is a version control manager, a software that tracks the changes of your files in a project over time
